page.title: 06MARYC.TOURISM FAMILY PARK
page.content: Storybook Glen,created by Anderson's Roses is on a 20 acre site off the South Deeside Rd.(B9077)about 6 miles west of Aberdeen.It is full of plants,animals,fairy-tale characters. There is a large car park and facilities for elderly and disabled. The restaurant seats 220 and there is a souvenir and confectionery shop. The Glen is open 7 days a week from 9am to 8pm May to Sept.During the closed season the restaurant may be hired for parties.Among the fantastic things to look out for are:Robinson Crusoe's Island,Snow White's cottage,Old Macdonald's farm,and castle complete with dungeon.For older people memories will be of stately trees,banks of flowers and everywhere the scent of roses.
